description:
The Google app keeps you in the know about things that matter to you. Find quick answers, explore your interests and stay up to date with Discover.

• Use your camera to identify what you're looking at – whether that's a colourful butterfly, a spiky plant or anything else you're curious about.
• Translate over 100 languages on things like street signs, menus and any other words you can point your camera at.
• See something you like? Use your camera to find out where you can buy it.
• Refine your camera searches by adding words – whether you want those shoes but in 'blue', or want to learn how to 'repair' that broken piece on your bicycle.
• Search by singing, even when you've forgotten the lyrics. Hum a song into the Google app to find out what it is.
• Use your camera for homework help. With step-by-step guides and videos, you can learn ways to solve maths, chemistry, biology and physics problems.


Get personalised updates in Discover:
• Stay in the know about topics that interest you.
• Start your morning with weather and top news.
• Get real-time updates on sports, films and events.
• Know as soon as your favourite artists drop new albums.
• Get stories about your interests and hobbies.
• Follow interesting topics, straight from Search results.


Search safely and securely:
• All searches in the Google app are protected by encrypting the connection between your device and Google.
• Privacy controls are easy to find and use. Tap your profile picture to access your menu and delete recent search history from your account with one click.
• Search takes a proactive approach to filtering webspam to help ensure that you see safe, high-quality results.


More ways to access Google:
• Google Search widget — search from your home screen or lock screen with the new Google widget. Choose from two widgets, giving you a quick access search bar in both sizes, and other search shortcuts to choose from such as Lens, Voice and Incognito in the medium-sized widget.


Learn more about what the Google app can do for you: http://www.google.com/search/about

Privacy policy: https://www.google.com/policies/privacy

Your feedback helps us to create products that you'll love. Join a user research study here:

https://goo.gl/kKQn99

Chrome helps you do what's possible on the web. Download the fast, secure browser by Google.

GET THE BEST OF GOOGLE IN CHROME

• SEARCH WITH GOOGLE – search and get answers on Google fast. Use your voice to search hands-free.
• GOOGLE LENS – search what you see on your screen or with your camera.
• GOOGLE TRANSLATE – explore the web in 130+ languages. Translate entire websites in one click.

BROWSE WITH BEST-IN-CLASS SECURITY

• ENHANCED PROTECTION MODE – browse confidently with the highest level of Chrome's security.
• SAFETY CHECK – get peace of mind with proactive safety alerts.
• GOOGLE PASSWORD MANAGER – securely generate and save passwords for fast sign-in, and get alerts if your passwords are at risk.

ACCESS YOUR CHROME ACROSS DEVICES

• SYNC ACROSS DEVICES – save your things (like bookmarks, tabs and passwords) and easily access them when you sign in to Chrome on your phone, computer or tablet.
• TAB GROUPS – create tab groups to stay organised across devices.
• AUTOFILL – save time typing by autofilling your saved payments, addresses and passwords.

Discover new ways to enjoy life with GlobeOne, your life-enhancing digital companion! Get more from your Globe and TM accounts -- buy SuperXclusive promos, pay all your bills in one go, earn more points, redeem exciting rewards, and so much more all in one app. 

GET MORE FROM GLOBE AND TM
- Create an account using a Philippine mobile number
- Enroll all of your Globe and TM accounts to stay connected and keep track of your data usage and add-ons in one simple dashboard: Globe Prepaid and MyFi, TM, Globe Postpaid, Globe Platinum, GFiber Postpaid, GFiber Prepaid, Home Prepaid WiFi
- Buy a Prepaid eSIM

STAY CONNECTED WITH APP-EXCLUSIVE PROMOS
- Quickly subscribe to your recently bought promo, or discover your top pick
- Get additional data, longer validity, or freebies when you buy SuperXclusive promos.
- Subscribe to auto-renew and always be connected
- Roam like a local: subscribe to roaming promos or book your roaming promos ahead of your trip 

PAY ALL YOUR GLOBE AND OTHER BILLS
- View and download your billing statements for your Globe Postpaid and Globe At Home accounts
- Get real-time payment posting when you pay in GlobeOne
- Pay all your Globe bills in one transaction
- Never miss a due date when you set payment reminders
- Pay other billers such as utilities, airlines, credit cards, insurance, and many more

LOVE THE WAY YOU PAY 
- Pay with eWallets: GCash, Shopee Pay, Grab Pay, Maya
- Pay with bank transfer: BPI, RCBC, Unionbank
- Pay with credit cards
- Link your GCash mobile number and view your balance

ENJOY FUN AND REWARDING EXPERIENCES 
- Join the All-New Rewards for all your Globe and TM accounts
- Earn points when you load promos and pay Globe bills in GlobeOne
- Redeem telco promos, vouchers, gifts, and many more using your points
- Don't miss out on flash deals and surprises
- Play and win everyday with TM FunRewards
- Experience the VIP Experience with Globe Rewards+

MAXIMIZE AND MANAGE YOUR ACCOUNTS
- Register your SIM
- Update or renew your plan
- Customize your All-New GPlan Plus plan and convert your GBs into vouchers
- Upgrade your physical SIM
- Add a new GFiber broadband connection with no additional requirements needed

DISCOVER LIFE ESSENTIALS
- Explore new ways to enjoy the digital life across food, health, education, and finance
- Earn cashback by selling load and promos with GoEARN and TM EasyRAKET

DITO APP is your one-stop full digital access to DITO Telecommunity. Manage your DITO Mobile and DITO 5G Home accounts whenever, wherever.


JOIN US DITO!


• Buy a DITO Prepaid SIM with option to choose your own number.
• Apply for a DITO Mobile Postpaid Plan.
• Get unlimited 5G for your fam with DITO Home!
• Switch to DITO with mobile number portability in just a few taps!




REGISTER your SIM cards using the DITO App!
• Register one or up to 5 SIM cards at a time.
• Take a photo of your valid ID and automatically fill out the form.
• Know your registration status right from the App dashboard.




Have full control of your DITO profile!
• Sign-in to the DITO app using your DITO mobile number and password.
• Forgot your password? We got you! You can sign-in via SMS code.
• Update your DITO account profile.




Manage your DITO account easily!
• Check your real-time balance anytime, anywhere.
• Stay updated of your promo subscription through your account dashboard.




Reloading made easier!
• Buy regular load and HIGH-SPEED data promos with options to pay using your debit/credit card or GCash, Grabpay, Maya, ShopeePay & Wechat e-wallet accounts. You can also pay using your DITO Points!

• Enjoy automatic renewal with AUTO PAY and get up to 10GB more
• Purchase promos with ADVANCE PAY and save up to 40%
• Get first dibs on HOT DEALS and EXCLUSIVE offers only for you!
• Share load and data with other DITOzens!
• View your load and promo availment history.




Loyal subscribers are rewarded DITO!
• Earn DITO points when you buy load, buy promos, or update your DITO Rewards profile.
• Exchange your DITO points for variety of exclusive DITO products and services that suit your lifestyle!




Customer support is just one tap away!
• Chat with our customer care specialists for your concerns.
• View Top Questions for inquiries.
• Option to file a report when you encounter problems or difficulties with DITO services.




With the DITO App, you can also:
• Check out Network Coverage for the growing list of areas we cover!
• View DITO Telecommunity's Terms & Conditions and Data Privacy Statement.

This is the Smart app, formerly Gigalife! Your gateway to live more today! Discover and enjoy your passions all in one tap!

The Smart app is now available for the following brands: Smart Prepaid, Smart Bro Prepaid, TNT, Smart Postpaid, Smart Bro Postpaid, Smart Signature and now for PLDT Prepaid Home WiFi.



Prepaid features on the Smart app:

- Top-up your account using your Debit/Credit Card or PayMaya powered by GigaPay!
- Discover and register new promos for more Video, more Stories, more Games! 
- Monitor & check your Inbox to review your subscriptions, inclusions and your usage.
- Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.



Postpaid features on the Smart app:

- Easily review the billing history of your account.
- Conveniently pay your bill using Debit/Credit Card, PayMaya and even GigaPoints!
- Always be on top of your data usage with the real time data tracker.
- Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.



Earn MORE GigaPoints to redeem MORE on the Smart app!

- Easily monitor & earn GigaPoints points for transactions you do on the app! It’s that simple!
- Redeem your points on the app. Keep an eye out for the exciting items you can redeem only on the GigaLife App!



Buying Load and Promos are now made easier with GigaPay:

- Link a PayMaya e-wallet or your credit/debit cards to activate GigaPay within the Smart app. 
- GigaPay makes buying promos and topping up your load simpler and more convenient without having to leave the app, with a quick swipe-to-pay!
- Link up to 5 fund sources to GigaPay, and earn GigaPoints for the first 2!
- Monitor every GigaPay transaction you make directly on the Smart app.



The Smart app is FREE to use when you are on the Philippines' fastest LTE network. This is available for all Smart and TNT subscribers and you can delete any previous version of the TNT or MySmart App you may have installed in the past.




In 2023, The Smart App Team continues to keep on improving Smart. A lot of awesome features are coming your way as we continue to listen to your comments and suggestions.

Stay tuned for more updates!

developer: Chongqing Daole Er Technology Co., Ltd
description:
Love8 is the ultimate love app for couples, designed to strengthen your relationship. 
With love8,Connect more deeply, communicate more effectively, and improve intimacy with your love.From now on, there will no longer be a sense of distance, and you can discover the freshness of each other every day.

Love8's main functions:

Location Share
nstantly share  real-time location,speed, battery level, and duration of stay with your love. Always know how far you are from me,Just like being together!

Pet
Feed and interact at any time, enjoy the fun of raising pets on your mobile phone with your partner, grow with your pets,  witness your love.

Special day
Share special moments with your loved ones.Every important day deserves to be recorded.At the same time, you can turn on repeated reminders to remind you how many days are left until the next anniversary.

Widget
see important info on the home screen.Unlocking more than just your phone — unlocking love.

Stories
Record daily life and remember sweet moments with your love.Being loved is always worth recording.

Miss you effects
Send romantic effects for two of you.Receive love signals at any time on the app.

Battery
Keep an eye on your partner's battery level. Get alerts before their phone runs out.

Love8 has free content and also offers a Premium subscription that can be renewed on monthly or yearly basis. 

Premium membership benefits will begin on the date of subscription and will auto-renew at the end of the period, unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Payments will be charged to your AppleID.

You can manage your subscription and turn-off auto-renewal by going to the Account Settings after the purchase. You may cancel your subscription at any time.

Terms and Conditions: https://web.love8.ltd/terms_of_service.html
Privacy Policy: https://web.love8.ltd/privacy_policy.html

Google Authenticator adds an extra layer of security to your online accounts by adding a second step of verification when you sign in. This means that in addition to your password, you'll also need to enter a code that is generated by the Google Authenticator app on your phone.

The verification code can be generated by the Google Authenticator app on your phone, even if you don't have a network or mobile connection.

• Sync your Authenticator codes to your Google Account and across your devices. This way, you can always access them even if you lose your phone.

• Set up your Authenticator accounts automatically with a QR code. This is quick and easy, and it helps to ensure that your codes are set up correctly.

• Support for multiple accounts. You can use the authenticator app to manage multiple accounts, so you don't have to switch between apps every time you need to sign in.

• Support for time-based and counter-based code generation. You can choose the type of code generation that best suits your needs.

• Transfer accounts between devices with a QR code. This is a convenient way to move your accounts to a new device.


To use Google Authenticator with Google, you need to enable 2-Step Verification on your Google Account. To get started, visit http://www.google.com/2step

Browse 3X faster on Brave Browser. You’ll get a fast, safe, private web browser with AI, Adblock, and VPN. 

Loved by over 100+ million users, Brave has an AI assistant Brave Leo, Firewall + VPN, Brave Wallet, Brave Search, Brave Playlist, and night mode.

NEW Features: 
• Brave Leo: AI assistant
• VPN + Firewall
• Brave Wallet. A secure multi-chain crypto wallet built into the browser.
• Brave Search. Search without being tracked. 
• Brave Playlist. Add media and play anytime, even offline. 
• Night Mode. Easily read in low light. 
• Voice Search. Initiate searches with your voice. 
• Brave News Widget. Stay updated on the latest news.

Additional Features:
• Built-in 3rd party Adblock
• Pop-up blocker
• Saves battery and data 
• Tracking protection
• HTTPS everywhere (for security)
• Script blocking
• Browsing history
• Private and recent tabs
• Blocks cookie consent notifications by default. 
• Use voice search in the browser.
• Import/export bookmarks to another browser.

NEW: AI ASSISTANT
Meet Brave Leo, the smart, free AI assistant in your browser. Ask answers, get answers, translate languages, and more. Leo doesn't record or share your chats, or use them for model training.

NEW: BRAVE WALLET
Buy, store, send, receive, and swap crypto with Brave’s secure Web3 wallet, built right into the browser. Support for Ethereum, Solana, BNB Chain, and more.

NEW: BRAVE SEARCH 
Brave Search is the only global-scale search engine built with privacy at its core. Brave Search doesn't profile you, and it's independent of Big Tech.

NEW: BRAVE PLAYLIST
Make a playlist of the content you love. Add almost any media and play anytime, anywhere, even offline, or with Apple CarPlay. 

FAST & SECURE
Get protected from ads infected with malware. Brave simply provides the fastest, most secure private browsing experience available.    
 
BATTERY & DATA OPTIMIZATION
Brave is proven to have a 2x to 4x speed increase on iOS, reducing both battery and data consumption.
  
PRIVACY PROTECTION
Be protected with leading privacy and security features such as HTTPS Everywhere (encrypted data traffic), script blocking, cookie blocking, and private incognito tabs. All other browsers fall short of the level of privacy and security protection that Brave provides.

DEFAULT BROWSER
Set Brave as your default browser! Select Settings - scroll down to select Brave - select Brave as the Default Browser App.

FIREWALL + VPN and AI Subscriptions
Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Firewall + VPN subscriptions are offered for either 1 month or 1-year period. Brave Leo AI has a premium version offered at 1 month. All subscription plans will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel the subscription once activated. You can manage your subscription in Account Settings after purchase. Free trials may only be used once. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

ABOUT BRAVE
Our mission is to protect your privacy online by making a safe, fast, and private browser while growing ad revenue for content creators. Brave aims to transform the online ad ecosystem with micropayments and a new revenue-sharing solution to give users and publishers a better deal.

To learn more about Brave, visit https://www.brave.com

Questions/support? Email us at https://brave.com/msupport. We love hearing from you.

Enjoying the app? Please leave us a 5 star review! 

Terms of Use: https://brave.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: https://brave.com/privacy/

Meralco Online is now My Meralco! Discover the new dynamic dashboard and enjoy real-time payment posting.  

This version is the soft launch of the app – while some features are limited, stay tuned for exciting updates coming your way. Thank you for your patience and support!

Take full control of your financial life with FinLedger, the all-in-one app that helps you record, manage, and analyze your income and expenses. Whether you are tracking daily spending, planning monthly budgets, or reviewing your yearly financial performance, FinLedger provides the tools and insights you need to build healthier financial habits.

Why choose FinLedger?

Managing money is not just about writing down numbers — it’s about understanding your financial story. FinLedger makes this process intuitive and empowering with simple recording, intelligent analysis, and clear visual reports.

Key Features

Quick & Easy Recording
Add transactions in just a few taps. Whether it’s your morning coffee, grocery shopping, salary, or freelance income, everything can be captured instantly.

Customizable Categories
Organize your spending into categories such as Food, Transport, Utilities, Shopping, Entertainment, and more. You can even create your own categories to fit your lifestyle.

Visual Charts & Reports
Turn complex numbers into easy-to-read graphs. FinLedger shows you where your money goes, your biggest spending habits, and how your savings progress over time.

Daily, Monthly, and Annual Overview
Track short-term and long-term financial trends. See your daily cash flow, evaluate your monthly balance, and review your yearly financial growth at a glance.

Search & History
Find past records quickly with smart filters. Review your transaction history by keyword, date range, or category whenever you need.

Secure Data & Privacy Protection
Your financial data belongs to you. FinLedger ensures your information is stored securely, and you can request account deletion and data removal at any time.

Simple Yet Powerful
Designed for both beginners and advanced users, FinLedger balances simplicity with powerful features, making financial tracking stress-free.

Benefits You’ll Enjoy
Build awareness of your spending habits
Improve your budgeting skills
Identify opportunities to save more
Stay motivated with clear progress reports
Gain confidence and clarity in managing money

With FinLedger, you are not just keeping records — you are building the foundation for smarter financial decisions and a more secure future.
Start your journey toward financial clarity today. Download FinLedger and see where your money takes you.

Explore the world smarter with Travel Camera & Compass – your ultimate travel companion!
Whether you’re wandering through ancient cities or hiking remote trails, our app combines powerful tools to help you capture, navigate, and experience the world like never before.

Key Features: 
- Travel Camera: Take stunning photos wherever you go with our optimized travel camera. Every snapshot can be automatically tagged with your location, so you’ll always remember where each memory was made. Plus, choose from a wide range of beautiful styles and filters to make your travel photos stand out – from cinematic tones to vibrant holiday vibes. Perfect for quick snapshots, scenic landscapes, and share-worthy moments..

- Interactive Map with Travel Highlights: Discover new destinations through an immersive world map. We’ve marked iconic landmarks, hidden gems, and trending spots directly on the map. You can view different terrain types – satellite, hybrid, or standard – for a customized navigation experience.

- 3D Globe View: Zoom out and explore the Earth in 3D! A global view helps you visualize your travel path and highlights locations worth visiting.

- Watch Travel Highlight Videos: Get a real feel of places before you go. Watch curated or live video clips from various destinations worldwide, giving you a preview of the adventure that awaits.

- Extract Audio from Videos: Want to save the sound from your favorite travel clips? With just a tap, you can convert any video into an audio file. Great for saving local music, soundscapes, or memorable voice notes.

- Digital Compass: Navigate confidently, even when offline. The built-in compass shows your current direction and bearing – essential for hikers, trekkers, or road trippers.

Why Choose Travel Camera & Compass?

* Combines multiple travel tools in one app
* Helps you discover and plan your next destination
* Enhances your travel experience through rich media
* Intuitive interface designed for travelers of all kinds
* Lightweight and battery-friendly, perfect for long trips

Whether you’re a backpacker, travel vlogger, or casual explorer, Travel Camera & Compass gives you everything you need to document your journey and stay oriented wherever you are.

Travel Camera is your smart travel companion, allowing you to capture, organize, and share beautiful memories from your journeys with ease.

Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/view/travelcameratermsofuse
Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/travelcameraprivacypolicy

Tshow is your all-in-one movie and TV show companion — helping you explore titles, learn about your favorite stars, and even test your entertainment IQ with fun quizzes!

From trailers and ratings to cast details and streaming info, Tshow brings everything together in a clean and easy-to-use experience.

- View Celebrity Profiles with bios, images & filmography

- Browse overviews, genres, and ratings
- Create and manage your personal watchlist

Whether you're planning your next movie night or just browsing what’s new — Tshow helps you stay informed and entertained.

Data Source
This product uses the TMDb API to provide movie and TV show metadata.
It is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
https://www.themoviedb.org

!Disclaimer
Tshow does not stream or host any full-length content.
It is intended for informational and discovery purposes only.
All content rights and trademarks belong to their respective owners.

Clean up your iPhone and optimize storage in seconds. 

Remove duplicate photos, videos, and junk emails. Cleanup helps you clear your camera roll, merge duplicate contacts, compress videos, and organize storage — all in one app.

OPTIMIZE STORAGE – FREE UP SPACE WITH ONE TAP
Running low on space? Cleanup gives you powerful tools to take control:
- Delete duplicate photos and videos
- Remove similar screenshots and lookalike videos
- Compress large files without losing quality
- Clean up spam and promotional emails
- Delete unused contacts and tidy up your address book
- Free up storage instantly with one tap.

CLEAN YOUR GALLERY FAST - DELETE DUPLICATE PHOTOS
No more manual browsing. Cleanup makes it easy:
- Instantly detect and delete duplicate photos
- Smart grouping for similar photos, with “Best” marked
- Remove large, lookalike videos
- Identify and delete screenshots in bulk

EMAIL CLEANER - DECLUTTER YOUR INBOX
Declutter your inbox in seconds:
- Highlight and remove promo, spam, and unread emails
- Clear out junk with one tap

CONTACTS CLEANUP
Keep your contacts organized and up to date:
- Merge duplicates
- Remove incomplete or unused entries
- View and edit from one place

COMPRESS VIDEOS  - SAVE SPACE, KEEP QUALITY
Save storage without deleting memories:
- Compress large files with minimal quality loss
- Select exactly which videos to compress

CHARGING ANIMATIONS
Turn charging into a personal moment with vivid, customizable animations.

SECRET SPACE – HIDE WHAT’S PERSONAL
Hide personal content in a secure, PIN-protected vault only you can access.

WIDGETS
Add instant cleanup tools to your Home and Lock Screens:
- Battery and storage widgets
- Tap to launch cleanup features quickly

REVIEW BEFORE YOU DELETE
Nothing is removed without your approval.  After each cleaning session, you get a final review screen to double-check your selections.
 No accidental deletions, no surprises — you're always in control.

OFFLINE AND PRIVATE
Your data stays private:
- No internet connection needed
- No files leave your phone
- No tracking or data misuse

Your privacy is fully protected — even we can’t access your photos.





Payment & Subscription Terms:


Choose between the following subscription options for unlimited access to all features:


• Weekly Subscription
• Lifetime Subscription


FREE TRIAL FOR 7 DAYS - OFFERING UNLIMITED GALLERY CLEANING FOR A LIMITED TIME


***You may cancel your subscription at any time***


Cleanup’s free trial allows you unlimited access to all features for the duration of 7 days. Your account will be automatically charged for renewal, based on the annual subscription plan, within 24 hours before the end of the 7 days free trial period.


You can cancel auto-renewal at any time, given that the cancellation is at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when making a purchase of an auto-renewing subscription.


***Manage your subscription directly from your iPhone***
Subscriptions can be managed by the user and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to the Account Settings:
- Open the Settings app.
- Tap your name.
- Tap Subscriptions.
- Tap the subscription that you want to manage.




Privacy policy: https://cleanup.photos/privacy

Whether you're new to financial planning or already on your wealth-building journey, Credipillar offers professional and accurate tools to support your progress. Download now and take control of your financial future!

Introducing Universal Remote・TV Control, the revolutionary tv remote app that transforms your TV-watching and smart home experience. This universal tv remote app is designed to replace outdated physical remotes, bringing cutting-edge technology and convenience to your fingertips. It's more than just a universal tv remote—it's your gateway to a smarter, more streamlined lifestyle.

Universal Remote・TV Control combines the best features of a universal tv remote, compatible with all popular TV brands. Now you can effortlessly control your web-connected TV set from your iPhone. Whether it's streaming videos, showcasing photos, everything on your phone can be displayed on your TV with this innovative tv remote app.

Key Features of Our Universal TV Remote App:
- All-in-one solution: Replace multiple physical remotes with a single, powerful tv remote app
- Quick setup: Simple process with automatic server detection for easy network connection
- Comprehensive control: Manage channels, volume, menu, and more with our universal tv control
- Casting capabilities: Easily cast photos & videos to your TV
- Enhanced user experience: Enjoy haptic feedback, a quick-input keyboard, and an intuitive touchpad
- Stylish designs: Choose from various themes to personalize your universal tv remote app
- Wide compatibility: Works seamlessly with Roku Player, Roku TV, and all popular streaming services (Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube, etc.)
- Voice Input: Control your TV with simple voice commands for a truly hands-free experience

No more searching for misplaced remotes or changing batteries. With Universal Remote・TV Control, your phone becomes a feature-rich tv remote app that's always within reach. Effortlessly browse your favorite shows, movies, and programs, and enjoy the ability to screencast your media to the big screen.

Join millions of satisfied users and elevate your TV-watching experience with Universal Remote・TV Control. Download the ultimate universal tv remote app today and embrace a smarter way to control your entertainment!

Disclaimer:

Universal Remote・TV Control is NOT the official application of Samsung, LG, Sony, Philips, Hisense, Panasonic, Vizio, Insignia, TCL, Onn, Westinghouse, Skyworth, Element and it is NOT affiliated with or endorsed by these or any other companies.

Swipewipe is the app that will (finally) help you clean up your camera roll. And you’ll enjoy reminiscing while you do it.

We'll save you the time: Yes, there are other apps that can help you quickly delete photos on your phone. But none of them worked for us!

We wanted a simple, fun, elegant solution that let us go month-by-month, work our way through all our photos, videos, screenshots, and everything else in our camera roll, and decide - one by one - what to keep and what to get rid of. That’s Swipewipe.

Here’s how it works: swipe right to keep a photo, and left to delete it. If you make a mistake or change your mind, just tap the current photo to go back. Hold down on a picture to see its metadata. After you’re done reviewing that month’s photos, take one last look at the photos you chose to keep and the ones you chose to delete, make any tweaks you need to, and then…you’re done!

Each time you finish a month, it'll be crossed out. (You can always revisit that month, though.) If you get part way through a month and want to take a break, you can quit the app - a progress wheel will appear next to that month on the main screen, showing you how much further you have to go.

If you’d rather not go month by month (or even if you do!) we think you’ll like our new On This Day feature. It sticks to the top of your Swipewipe home screen, and each day, it updates with the photos that you took on this date one year ago, two years ago, and so on. Revisit your memories on their anniversary, and swipe through to determine what you’d like to keep and what you’d like to delete. (It’s pretty fun.)

We also have:
- Bookmarks (for any pictures you want to set aside)
- A widget (and streaks!) for On This Day
- Stats that show you how many photos you’ve reviewed, how much memory you’ve saved, and more

…and we’re always adding cool new stuff!

Our camera rolls shouldn't be such a mess. You should be able to look back at the memories you've made without getting interrupted by blurry duplicates, irrelevant screenshots, and other clutter that keeps you from the good stuff. That’s why we’re making Swipewipe.

Hope you like it, and happy swiping!

(Oh, and if you have any feedback, ideas, complaints, life advice, or anything else — email us at hey@swipewipe.app!)

• Scan, create, share and manage your own QR codes. QRbot uses Apple's built-in native scanning technology delivering quick results. Code formats supported include; QR code, EAN 13, EAN 8, UPC-A, UPC-E, Code 128, Data Matrix, PDF417, Aztec, Interleaved 2 of 5, Code 39, Code 93, Codabar, DataBar, etc.

Microsoft Edge is your AI-powered browser with Copilot built in — your personal AI assistant for smarter, more productive browsing. Powered by the latest AI models from OpenAI and Microsoft, Copilot helps you ask questions, refine searches, summarise content, write effortlessly, and create images. Talk to Copilot with your voice to brainstorm ideas, tackle complex questions, or even write stories and scripts — hands-free. Get real-time answers, support, and creative inspiration — all in one place. With AI deeply integrated into Edge through Copilot, you can browse, create, and get things done — anywhere, anytime.

Microsoft Edge offers powerful extensions for productivity, personalisation, and entertainment. Use extensions to stay private, block cookies, hide your location, and reduce distractions on YouTube. Stay organised with bookmarks and note-taking tools that make it easy to save and share content. Boost productivity with translation tools. Shop smarter and save money with price trackers and voucher finders. Personalise Microsoft Edge with extensions for a secure and tailored browsing experience that’s uniquely yours.

Microsoft Edge — your safe and secure browser. Browse the web securely and prioritise your privacy with smart security tools, such as tracking prevention, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen, AdBlock, InPrivate browsing and InPrivate search. Safeguard your browsing history for a more secure and private online experience.

Download Microsoft Edge — the AI-powered browser with Copilot built in. Explore smarter ways to search, create, and get things done with the power of AI at your fingertips. Enjoy a more connected and intuitive browsing experience with Microsoft Edge, wherever you are.

MICROSOFT EDGE FEATURES:
A SMARTER WAY TO FIND
• Supercharge your searches with Copilot, the AI assistant built into Microsoft Edge, delivering faster, more accurate, and personalised results.
• Explore visually with Copilot — upload images to search, get insights, or spark inspiration with AI Lens.
• Use AI-powered Copilot to instantly summarise web pages, PDFs, and videos — providing clear, cited insights in seconds.
• All powered by the most advanced AI models from OpenAI and Microsoft, enabling smarter information discovery like never before.

A SMARTER WAY TO DO
• Tailor your browsing experience with powerful extensions and redefine the way you browse.
• Talk to Copilot with your voice to brainstorm ideas, tackle complex questions, or even write stories and scripts — hands-free.
• Compose with Copilot — your built-in AI writer that transforms ideas into polished drafts. With AI and Copilot, creating content is faster, easier, and more intelligent than ever.
• Translate or proof-read across multiple languages with AI, making your writing globally ready.
• Generate images with Copilot — just describe what you want, and our AI brings it to life.
• Listen to content while performing other tasks or improve your reading comprehension with Read Aloud, in your chosen language. Available in a variety of natural-sounding voices and accents.
• Enhance productivity and seamlessly transfer files between devices with Drop.

A SMARTER WAY TO STAY SAFE
• Browse securely with InPrivate browsing that safeguards sensitive information from trackers.
• Enhanced privacy protection in InPrivate mode, with no search history saved to Microsoft Bing or associated with your Microsoft account.
• Password monitoring alerts you if any credentials saved in your browser are found on the dark web.
• Default tracking prevention for a more private browsing experience.
• Ad Blocker – use AdBlock Plus to block unwanted adverts, enhance focus, and remove distracting content.
• Stay protected while you browse by blocking phishing and malware attacks with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.

developer: CONVERGE INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS, INC
description:
With GoFiber App, you can access Converge services with ease:

EASIER APPLICATION
Check if your area is serviceable – For your total convenience, the GoFiber App lets you check if your area is available for service. Just input your necessary information, including your exact location to self-verify if your area is serviceable.
Fill up the application form – You can easily fill up the necessary details to begin your application. This will not take so much time, all thanks to the user-friendly interface.
Choose plans and add-ons suitable for your needs – Get a detailed look at the plans suitable for your needs. You may also peek at the available add-ons that will significantly enhance your pure fiber internet experience.
Upload files to submit requirements – Easily upload required documents to continue the application process, then verify your given email to complete the application

CHECK STATUS OF YOUR APPLICATION
Quickly check your application status by inputting your reference number. The app will specifically tell if you have any pending document that needs to be submitted, or if you are good to go for a connection.

COMPARE PLANS
Easily compare plans to help you finalize your requirements and pick according to your online needs.
Our Plans:
FiberX
Time of Day – Day
Time of Day – Night

PAY ONLINE
Pay Conveniently – Input your Converge account number to check your outstanding balance and to continue the quick payment process.
View your bill - See the summary of the amount to pay, series of your Statement of Accounts that you can download or view via app. You can now see all the bill details in just one page such as plan name, payment due date, previous balance, current bill charges, total amount due, billing period, view bill (SOA, billing history and payment history).

CREATE TICKET AS REFERENCE FOR YOUR REQUEST
Customer satisfaction is at the forefront of our service; hence you can easily create a ticket for any issue involving your plan, connection speed, payment, and technical support.

MOBILE DASHBOARD
With the convenient access to the mobile dashboard, you can easily preview the following:
Monitor the number of devices – See the number of devices connected to your modem.
Modem Temperature – Check if your modem is at its ideal temperature for optimal processing power.
Signal Strength – Indicates whether your modem is receiving the right level of signal to give you stability and the best possible connection.
Bill History - See the detailed summary of the amount to pay and your previous payments for your official record.
Request Tickets – Easily request a ticket for any issue that may arise. You may also view the status and details of your tickets.
Outage Advisory – The GoFiber App will automatically notify you if your area is experiencing an outage, with specific details of the issue.
Store Locator – You can easily search available Converge stores via the store locator. You just need to select a specific region, and the app will give you the complete store location with store details.

HELP & SUPPORT
Account Guide – A quick how-to guide on how to apply for a Converge internet plan.
Technical Issues – A detailed guide on how to troubleshoot modem indicators, network outage, and intermittent/slow connectivity.
Getting Started – A guide about the first steps on how to apply a Converge internet, the process, service areas, and documents needed to apply for a plan.
Payment and Bills – A guide on how to properly process and update and settle your bill.
About Us – This will direct you to our official website to give you detailed information about Converge ICT Solutions, Inc.
Get Help – A guide on how to manage your WIFI password, as well as how to upgrade your current plan and details about our value-added services.

Experience better with the power of pure end-to-end fiber internet from Converge!
‘Yan ang Internet!

Know more about us by visiting convergeict.com.
Send your concerns directly at customercare@convergeict.com.
